DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate AZD3480 inhibit Cytochrome P450 1A2 , 2C19 , 3A4 , 2C8 , 2B6 UGT1A1 activity .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study Between AZD3480 Cytochrome P450
DOC.criteria: Provision sign write informed consent Clinically normal physical finding laboratory value Clinically significant illness clinically relevant trauma within three week first dose History clinically significant disease Use prescribe medication 2 week administration first dose investigational product
